ygData.subject: Re: Raising Research Skill
ygData.msgSnippet: At 16 you can put just one point in Research.  Once you get to 20 you can put all you points into research, you did save all your practice didn t you ...
ygData.messageBody:
At 16 you can put just one point in Research. Once you get to 20 you can
put all you points into research, you did save all your practice didn't you
:)


Shadoewalker lvl 28 Necro Brell

----- Original Message -----
From: "Nat Russo" <nrusso@...>
To: "EQ_Necromancers" <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, February 15, 2000 10:43 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Raising Research Skill


> From: "Nat Russo" <nrusso@...>
>
> Hi folks,
>
> I am very rapidly approaching level 16 (about 2 bubbles away.....I'll get
> there as soon as I get home from work today :) ), and am wondering about
> Research. I would very much like to do all or most of my own research.
> However, I also play a level 22 Wiz who has NEVER been able to
successfully
> research ANYTHING.
>
> Is there any way to practice your research without having to use the
actual
> words that we come across? It seems like they are pretty hard to find (my
> Wizard finds runes all the time, but they are rarely the ones he needs).
>
> Anyway, I'm looking for any and all advice as to the best way of raising
> your research skill.
>
> Thanks in advance,
> Mujahid 15 Necro Sol Ro
>
>
